explanation: [0-0] In the video, a bald man with a goatee, sunglasses on his head, wearing a black T-shirt and black trousers is standing in front of a dining table. He holds a white cup in his right hand and a box of cookies in his left, about to put them on the table. The wooden dining table is covered with several gray placemats. There is a beige chair behind him, and in the background are wooden cabinets and a gray stone kitchen counter with an electric kettle plugged in.

[0-4] The man sits on the chair and puts the cup and the box of cookies on the dining table. He opens the cookie box with both hands, revealing 5 yellow and 3 brown cookies separated by white dividers inside.
